title: Grow Your Own - January 2018 (gnv64)
description: Grow Your Own - January 2018 English | 116 pages | True PDF | 49.2 mb SMART GARDENING 52 SMART NEWS Interesting developments in the world of growing, including new varieties 54 SMART STEP-BY-STEP Cultivate your own mushrooms in a matter of weeks 56 SMART GUIDE TO HEALTHTASTIC EDIBLES Kim Stoddart offers 2018 growing ideas to help beat the January blues VEG 6 THIS MONTH Handy advice for gardening in January 12 VEG TO SOW AND HARVEST A useful collection of all the edibles to start growing or picking 14 MY TASKS THIS MONTH The top jobs to keep your plot ship-shape this month 16 JOBS ON THE PLOT Stay organised on your allotment with these helpful pointers 18 ANNE SWITHINBANK: MAKE GARDEN RESOLUTIONS Anne gets her 2018 plot off to a flying start with these key tasks REGULARS 28 RHS Q&A Read these helpful tips from RHS experts on a range of topics 30 RHS WHAT’S ON THIS MONTH News and events from RHS gardens around the UK 31 RHS PRACTICAL BLACKCURRANT PRUNING Guy Barter shares his expert tips on pruning blackcurrant bushes 62 UNDER COVER Make the most of your crops with Sally’s ideas and projects 64 NAOMI SCHILLINGER: PLANT JAPANESE WINEBERRIES Naomi is looking forward to the growing year ahead MORE GROWING ADVICE 40 PICK OF THE CROP Take a look at products that make up an essential gardening starter kit 47 ASK THE EXPERTS Experienced gardeners discuss a range of reliable growing methods 58 MONTY DON’S GUIDE TO: RAISED BEDS The TV gardener shares his tips on this beneficial growing method 59 WINTER GARDEN TASKS Make the most of the colder months by carrying out these useful jobs 70 THE GREAT BRITISH GROWING AWARDS Take a look at the companies you can vote for.
